p: The doses of TVH, OVEO, and Tween 80 were used according to the previous publications [ 12, 26, 27]. At the end of the treatment period (2 weeks), the animals were sacrificed. Blood samples were collected in centrifuge tubes without anticoagulants and allowed to clot. The clotted blood was centrifuged at 4000Ã— g for 20 min. Serum was separated for biochemical analyses.
